document_data.mainbody:
he Black Mountains were a mountain range located on the island of Gwynneth within the Moonshae Isles.
The Black Mountains were found in northwest Gwynneth, forming much of the northern border of Myrloch Vale. They touched Aspenheight in the west and were separated from the Cambro Mountains in the east by the Codsrun Creek. The Deepglen Stream flowed south from the Black Mountains eastern slopes. The Black Mountains were approximately  long.
